newsitem.title: JAPAN: Softbank shares remain weaker due to dim forecast.
newsitem.headline: Softbank shares remain weaker due to dim forecast.

text.p: Shares in Softbank Corp continued their recent decline on Monday afternoon, after the firm released an earnings forecast on Thursday pointing to a slow growth rate, brokers said.
At 0433 GMT, the share price was down 440 yen at 7,170. Volume was 384,000 shares.
On Thursday, Softbank said its parent current profit was expected to rise to 25.00 billion yen in the year to March 31, 1998, from 23.41 billion yen in the previous year.
"The shares were depressed by Softbank's forecast of slow growth," said a trader at a foreign securities house.
